Statements.Statement: Use the "movementKeys" to control her movement.
Try to explore and don't let any obstacule interrupts you from do it. Use "jumpKey" to jump.
With "climbKeys" you can control the climb. And with "movementKeys" you can take a branch way.
Look at the sky is an amazing night.
But take care you are in a risky place.
Take a look of your kittens they could bring the attention of some other animals.
